content:
Based on 1-20, and because I am an account executive now at ownbackup, see my bio below, give me the I am, the reason, and how it fits me for 1-20>

##
BIO - SUMMARY
Dynamic and results-driven account executive with over a decade of experience in sales and a passion for driving business growth. Recognized for using data-driven strategies to identify market opportunities and for building and maintaining strong client relationships. Known for finding creative solutions to complex problems, and for a competitive focus on meeting and exceeding objectives and metrics. Seeking a challenging and rewarding opportunity to leverage my skills and experience in a dynamic and growing organization.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Account Executive, OwnBackup - SaaS Data Protection Platform Feb 2021 – Present •Achieved significant recognition, including being the first to reach President's Club in segment 2022, closing highest ACV in segment 2022, and being awarded a Top Performer at the Global 2023 Sales Kick-Off event. •Closed deals with 50+ new logos and consistently surpassed quotas, contributing to an increase in overall company revenue.
•Consistently driving revenue growth across numerous verticals, including Finance, Healthcare, Tech, Real Estate, and Retail.
•Built actionable sales plans that resulted in a consistent pipeline of sales opportunities, including a 20% increase in qualified leads within the first six months of 2022.
•Developed and executed rigorous multi-faceted outbound prospecting campaigns that manage all customer communication from initial discovery through close.
•Strong organizational skills to track and map processed outreach via cadences, Salesforce, and personalized calls and emails, resulting in an increased response rate to outbound communication.
•Manage a strategic portfolio of existing customers and partners, uncovering potential areas for future expansion and leading to an increase in total ACV.

##
